content: I'm trying to create a budget for my monthly expenses. Can you help me categorize my spending into needs and wants? I've been having trouble with impulse buys lately, and I want to make sure I'm not overspending on non-essential items. By the way, I learned the hard way that it's important to prioritize my spending - I realized I didn't have enough money left for other essentials a week later after making a big purchase last month.
